Grammar:	Map 5.1
Namespace:	cimi
Target:		FHIR_STU_3

	
AnatomicalLocation maps to BodySite:
	Value maps to code
	Laterality maps to qualifier (slice on = coding.code)
	AnatomicalDirection maps to qualifier

Specimen maps to Specimen:
	Type maps to type
	SourceSpecimen maps to parent
	ReceivedTime maps to receivedTime
	CollectionTime maps to collection.collected[x]
	CollectionMethod maps to collection.method
//	CollectionSite[CodeableConcept] maps to collection.bodySite   
//	CollectionSite[AnatomicalLocation] maps to http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/body-site-instance
	CollectionSite maps to http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/body-site-instance
